glsa.title: libid3tag: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A Denial of Service vulnerability was found in libid3tag.

background.p: libid3tag is an ID3 tag manipulation library.

description.p: Kentaro Oda reported an infinite loop in the file field.c when parsing an MP3 file with an ID3_FIELD_TYPE_STRINGLIST field that ends in '\0'.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted MP3 file, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libid3tag users should upgrade to the latest version:
